---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea to improve Rustact
labels: enhancement
---

## Summary
Describe the feature, enhancement, or use case.

## Motivation
Explain why this is useful. What problem does it solve? Who benefits?

## Proposal
Outline how you imagine it working. Mention any APIs, CLI flags, hooks, or UI changes.

## Alternatives considered
List any alternatives you've considered and why they aren't sufficient.

## Additional context
Add sketches, links, or related issues/PRs. If you're interested in contributing, mention that here!
